topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53ff62176368723c08540100#post_53ff62176368723c08540100
I sort of like it cause it gives me lots and lots of porn I like, if I had to go with a particular gal I would have to go with re-class battleship.

Speaking of Kantai I was watching the trailer for the anime and I'm not going to lie, I think the anime is going to tank the popularity; the reason why is that the franchise when you get down to it is a self-insert dating sim. . . yeah the anime is going towards the action side.  It could work if it was a harem comedy, but chances are it's going to be massively subpar.

topics.body:
The issue when using minecraft modpacks, is that most mods will usually all have very similar features, with one or two unique ones
Most mods add ore doubling and automated mining, and automated sorting, etc
And then one or two features unique to the mod
Honestly the only reason for using a modpack is for variety
